message: Hi Bob, I'm selling this product for $15,000.  It's a great deal for you, as it's worth at least $12,000 to you.  Let me know if you're interested!
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $13,000. Can you consider that?
Bob, I appreciate your interest, but $13,000 is just too low for me.  How about we split the difference and go with $14,000?  That's still a great deal for you, considering the value of the product.
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, but $14,000 is still a bit above my budget. I'd be willing to go up to $13,500. Can you meet me there?
Bob, I understand you have a budget, but $13,500 is still too far below my minimum.  I'm willing to come down a bit more to $14,500, but that's my final offer.  Let me know what you think.
I appreciate your willingness to come down, but $14,500 is still a bit above my budget. I'd be willing to go up to $13,750. Can you meet me there?

Bob, I'm starting to think we may not be able to reach an agreement.  $13,750 is still quite a bit below my minimum.  I'm willing to meet you halfway again and offer $14,250.  This is my final offer.  If you're not interested, I'll be selling to John.
I understand that you're trying to meet me halfway, but $14,250 is still a bit above my budget. I'd be willing to go up to $13,900. Can you consider that?
